zh.title: 印度总理英迪拉·甘地遇刺身亡
埃及航空990号班机坠毁，217人遇难
联盟TM-31发射，首批长期国际空间站居民
马来西亚总理马哈蒂尔·穆罕默德卸任
西蒙与舒斯特出版社出版《哈利·波特与混血王子》
俄罗斯科加雷姆航空9268号班机坠毁
沙特阿拉伯授予机器人索菲亚公民身份

en.title: Indian Prime Minister Indira Gandhi assassinated by her bodyguards.
The U.S. Congress passed the Uruguay Round Agreements Act, implementing GATT.
EgyptAir Flight 990 crashed into the Atlantic Ocean, killing all 217 on board.
Soyuz TM-31 launched, beginning permanent human presence on the ISS.
Malaysia's Mahathir Mohamad retired after 22 years as Prime Minister.
Metrojet Flight 9268 crashed in Sinai Peninsula, killing all 224 aboard.
Man Booker Prize awarded to George Saunders for "Lincoln in the Bardo".
